name: Ronald STOCKTON, Appellant v. Francis M. DOUGHERTY, et al., Appellees

parties: Ronald STOCKTON, Appellant v. Francis M. DOUGHERTY, et al., Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of March, 2014, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED. The Clerk of Courts’ “Motion to File Supplemental Brief’ is GRANTED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Ronald Stockton, Huntingdon, PA, pro se.
Kelly Susan Diffily, City of Philadelphia Law Department, Philadelphia, for Clerk of Courts of Philadelphia County.
Suzanne Noelle Hueston, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Mechanicsburg, for P.A. Davis, Jane Doe, John Doe, Francis M. Dougherty, Marikosa Lamas, Beatrice Rivello, Dorina Varner.
Travis Scott Anderson, PA Department of Corrections, Mechanicsburg, for P.A. Davis, Francis M. Dougherty, Marikosa Lamas, Beatrice Rivello, Dorina Varner.
